drinks.name: EXILE BLEND
drinks.desc: A truly “all purpose” coffee. We blend our own beans for this signature coffee.

drinks.name: CHURCH BLEND
drinks.desc: A deep dark coffee blended from beans we roast ourselves.

drinks.name: GUATEMALA ANTIGUA
drinks.desc: A balanced bean with natural nutty, spice, and chocolate flavors.

drinks.name: KENYA KIRINYAGA AA
drinks.desc: A full-bodied coffee with a complex spectrum of citrus and apple aromas.

drinks.name: ETHIOPIA SIDAMO
drinks.desc: Bright with a silky rich body. Intense apricot, milk chocolate, and tarragon.

drinks.name: HONDURAS
drinks.desc: A well-rounded coffee with notes of fig, clove, orange peel, and chamomile.

drinks.name: COLOMBIA
drinks.desc: A high quality balanced coffee with natural notes of baked apple, milk chocolate, citrus and hazelnut.

drinks.name: HIBISCUS TEA
drinks.desc: Our own natural blend of hibiscus and dried orange peel, seved with a cinnamon stick.

drinks.name: HOMEMADE CHAI TEA LATTE
drinks.desc: An aromatic milky drink with fresh ginger, clove, star anise, cinnamon, cardamom, black pepper, nutmeg and black tea.

drinks.name: CYPRUS SANGRIA (seasonal)
drinks.desc: A sweet blend of red wine & fruit juice, served with frozen cherries and an orange slice

drinks.name: SALTED CARAMEL LATTE
drinks.desc: Homemade caramel sauce, a pinch of salt and an optional shot of brandy added to our classic latte. 36 TL (with brandy)

drinks.name: BLACK DEATH
drinks.desc: Espresso and zivaniya over ice with activated charcoal.

Food.name: BARNEY
Food.desc: A classic grilled cheese sandwich with our perfect blend of cheeses. Its gooey, stretchy, and satisfying. Pairs perfectly with our Öz Lale wine.

Food.name: BENJI
Food.desc: Grilled chicken and kasar cheese with our own honey mustard.

Food.name: RUBY
Food.desc: Halloumi and sour cherry jam with fresh basil. Tastes like Cyprus.

Food.name: OZIE
Food.desc: Spicy chicken with gouda cheese and our garlic and pepper spread. It hurts good.

Food.name: PIGGY
Food.desc: Bacon and cheese with fig jam. Sweet and salty and perfectly balanced. Pairs well with our Alev wine.

Food.name: GARDEN SALAD WITH GRILLED CHICKEN
Food.desc: Optional Dressings: • Honey Mustard Dressing • Pomegranate Vinaigrette

Food.name: SAINT FRANK
Food.desc: Jumbo hot dog on a toasted bun with potato salad, pickled red onions, kale strings, french fries & ketchup

Food.name: COLD CHICKEN SALAD BAGUETTE
Food.desc: Chicken salad with our homemade mayo, pickled red onions, sun dried tomatoes, and kale strings on a French style baguette.

Food.name: JONAH
Food.desc: A fresh baguette with homemade meatballs, tomato sauce, grated cheese, grilled onions and peppers.

Food.name: THE PRINCESS (SPICY FRIED CHICKEN)
Food.desc: Crispy spicy fried chicken inspired by Prince's Hot Chicken in Nashville. Served on toasted bread with pickled onions and kale strings.

Food.name: BRISTOL BURGER
Food.desc: tomato, pickles, onions, and our own sangria marmelade on the side.

Food.name: ABOMINATION
Food.desc: A burger that shouldnt exist. A giant beef burger with onions and tomatoes & two grilled cheese sandwiches as the bun.

Food.name: FRENCH TOAST STACK
Food.desc: Thick cut toast dipped in our perfectly seasoned egg mix and cooked on the skillet. Served with our homemade syrup, thick whipped cream, and fresh fruit

Food.name: MERT
Food.desc: Our breakfast sandwich: homemade falafel, egg and cheese on a toasted ciabatta bun, served with tomato and attitude

Food.name: RAMEN OMELETTE
Food.desc: Spiced ramen noodles fried into an omlette with two eggs & fresh herbs with hot sauce on two pieces of toast.

Food.name: CHICKEN TACO
Food.desc: Crispy fried homemade tortillas filled with seasoned chicken, cheese, lettuce and our own tomato salsa.(available every Tuesday)

Food.name: BEEF TACO
Food.desc: Crispy fried homemade tortillas filled with seasoned beef, cheese, lettuce and our own tomato salsa.(available every Tuesday)

Food.name: FALAFEL TACO
Food.desc: Crispy fried homemade tortillas filled with falafel, cheese, lettuce and our own tomato salsa.(available every Tuesday)

Food.desc: Optional Cheesecake Sauces: • Caramel • Strawberry & Mint
